name: Loaded Against You - Game Jam 24hrs
description:
This is an adventure game to fight with your load!

Try everything while you are waiting, and see what will going to happen. As soon as you unlock the key gameplay, then have fun!

Note: if you are stuck, try to click the blue bar.

This game I made for 24 hours game jam. I was the main programmer, and a leader in the team!

Please enjoy.
